column4: hey knowledgable people, i need to check on a program to make sure it's working right (debug style, console w.e) how can i do that while the program's running?
what do you need to check to make sure it is running right?
well i grabbed wine from the wine repository and installed it and now i'm running SteamInstall.exe and i don't know if all is running smoothly (it's taking it's sweet time)...
you should see the window with steaminstall if it works.  I have yet to successfully install steam in wine
